EmailTemplate.name: 2019.09.13 - Prelogin- Friday the 13th.Prelogin - Friday the 13th
EmailTemplate.subject: Get $13 OFF Your Purchase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s Friday The 13th Did you know some cultures consider today to be a lucky day? Make today lucky for your business, these tips will help: Keep your luck going with $13 OFF** your next purchase of $75 or more. Use code 19FRI13 at checkout. Valid until September 18, 2019.
Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Big Deals Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details. **Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 19FRI13 at checkout. Not valid on copy paper, bottled water, ink & toner, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires September 18, 2019. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
